attributes.action: Install a serious politician to oversee global affairs relating to war.
attributes.additional_details: Europe is under significant threat from war with Russia. We need a serious politician with an immaculate reputation and moral standing to lead us in matters of diplomacy and to protect us from war. The politician should have an immaculate record entirely free from  scandal and police investigation. The UK must maintain a positive reputation on the global  stage.
attributes.background: Install a serious politician to oversee serious matters of diplomacy.

rejection.details: We can't accept petitions about appointments, which includes calling for changes to Ministerial appointments.
